Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL
Name: Jug
Description: Globular jug with a narrow neck, a body with curved walls and a bottom with ring-shaped foot. The piece is fragmented at the start of the neck. Paste of a pink colour and the exterior surface which has suffered much degradation is partially covered with a burnished coating of a brown colour.
